name: Quebrada Honda
description:
Fun short route w/ local swimming hole, slides/jumps, and access to an old mine (Minas del Aguacate).

Approach

Park at the swimming hole (beware of theft), and hike the road to the start.

Descent

Nice descent with a few jumps (test depth), rappels in the flow, and a great slide at the end (where locals will be gathered swimming and sunbathing). For extra exploration there is a cave on canyon right near the end.

Exit

Finishes back at the road where you parked.

Red tape

Private land near where you drop in the creek.

Beta sites

https://www.toroscr.com/quebrada-honda
